title: VR-Based Adaptive Mathematics Learning System: Personalized Feedback via Eye-Tracking and Deep Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining smartphone-based VR viewers with offline workbooks, structured with biweekly VR practical sessions and three offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can improve problem-solving concentration by over 30% using eye-tracking technology in a VR environment
Learners can apply mathematics problem-solving strategies tailored to individual cognitive load via a deep learning-based adaptive feedback system with 80% accuracy
Learners can achieve a correlation of 0.7 or higher between visual attention metrics and conceptual understanding measured in formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
